product_name: Sea to Summit Lightweight Dry Sack - X-Large
long_description: The extra-large, waterproof Sea to Summit Lightweight Dry Sack keeps your gear dry and functioning, whether on land or at sea. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. Coated nylon body makes this a lightweight yet durable choice. White lining makes it easy to locate items inside. Durable buckle with D-ring attachment point secures roll top shut and secures sack to a pack or kayak. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The extra-large, waterproof Sea to Summit Lightweight Dry Sack keeps your gear dry and functioning, whether on land or at sea.
